price: E os que renegam a Fé dizem: "Será que quando formos pó, seremos ressuscitados, nós e nossos pais?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
